effect:
**On Enter**: Put two **glimmer** counters on CARDNAME.

**Inherited Effect** — [REST]: Activate a Reaction Spell card from your memory. Pay its reserve cost only by removing that many **glimmer** counters from CARDNAME. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Put two glimmer counters on Diao Chan.

Inherited Effect — REST: Activate a Reaction Spell card from your memory. Pay its reserve cost only by removing that many glimmer counters from Diao Chan. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn.
name: Diao Chan, Enchantress

rule.description: Diao Chan's activated ability changes how the reserve cost is paid. Modifiers to that reserve cost still apply and any additional non-reserve costs must still be paid.

effect_html: On Enter: Put two glimmer counters on Diao Chan.Inherited Effect —: Activate a Reaction Spell card from your memory. Pay its reserve cost only by removing that many glimmer counters from Diao Chan. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn.

effect:
**Diao Chan Lineage**

**Inherited Effect** — At the beginning of your end phase, if the amount of **glimmer** counters on CARDNAME is less than the amount of phantasias you control, put an amount of **glimmer** counters on CARDNAME equal to the difference.
effect_raw:
Diao Chan Lineage

Inherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, if the amount of glimmer counters on Diao Chan is less than the amount of phantasias you control, put an amount of glimmer counters on Diao Chan equal to the difference.
name: Diao Chan, Dreaming Wish
effect_html: Diao Chan LineageInherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, if the amount of glimmer counters on Diao Chan is less than the amount of phantasias you control, put an amount of glimmer counters on Diao Chan equal to the difference.

effect:
**Diao Chan Lineage**

**On Enter**: Choose any amount of non-champion objects and put a **wither** counter on each of them.

Whenever a non-token object an opponent controls is destroyed, you may banish it. If you do, that opponent **summons** a Flowerbud token.
effect_raw:
Diao Chan Lineage

On Enter: Choose any amount of non-champion objects and put a wither counter on each of them.

Whenever a non-token object an opponent controls is destroyed, you may banish it. If you do, that opponent summons a Flowerbud token.
name: Diao Chan, Idyll Corsage

rule.description: The destroyed object must be banished by Diao Chan's trigger from the graveyard to have its controller summon a Flowerbud token. A Flowerbud token will not be summoned on the destruction of a regalia, which never exists in the graveyard. In addition, if the destroyed card was banished before Diao Chan's trigger resolves, because this trigger's effect did not do the banishing, a Flowerbud token will also not be summoned.
Returning from a combat phase to main phase does not start a new main phase but resumes the previous one. The wither trigger does not happen when returning to main phase from combat.

The main phase trigger for wither counters is one collective trigger. In one resolution, the turn player decides to pay or not pay for objects with wither counters on them, sacrifices all objects where the all wither counters were not paid for, and then remove all wither counters from all objects they control.

effect_html: Diao Chan LineageOn Enter: Choose any amount of non-champion objects and put a wither counter on each of them.Whenever a non-token object an opponent controls is destroyed, you may banish it. If you do, that opponent summons a Flowerbud token.

editions.flavor: "Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze."
Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze.
"Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze."

effect: **On Enter:** If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.
effect_raw: On Enter: If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.
name: Guo Jia, Chosen Disciple

result_editions.flavor: "Despite what others may believe, the lily pad provides relief for many beneath its gentle shade, away from the sun's relentless blaze."

rule.description: Guo Jia's on enter trigger puts a regalia directly onto the field. This does not count as a materlization, and ignores needing to pay cost and checking elemental requirements.

effect_html: On Enter: If you don't control a Fatestone regalia, reveal all cards in your material deck. Then put a Fatestone regalia card with the lowest memory cost from among them onto the field.

effect:
**Guo Jia Lineage**

**On Enter:** You may put two **quest** counters on CARDNAME. If you don't, draw a card.

**Lineage Release** — **Negate** target activation or trigger that targets a Fatestone or Fatebound object you control.
effect_raw:
Guo Jia Lineage

On Enter: You may put two quest counters on Guo Jia. If you don't, draw a card.

Lineage Release — Negate target activation or trigger that targets a Fatestone or Fatebound object you control.
name: Guo Jia, Blessed Scion
effect_html: Guo Jia LineageOn Enter: You may put two quest counters on Guo Jia. If you don't, draw a card.Lineage Release — Negate target activation or trigger that targets a Fatestone or Fatebound object you control.

effect:
As long as you control a Shenju ally, this card costs 3 less to materialize.

**Guo Jia Lineage**

**On Enter:** You may put three **quest** counters on CARDNAME. If you don't, **recover 3**.
effect_raw:
As long as you control a Shenju ally, this card costs 3 less to materialize.

Guo Jia Lineage

On Enter: You may put three quest counters on Guo Jia. If you don't, recover 3.
name: Guo Jia, Heaven's Favored
effect_html: As long as you control a Shenju ally, this card costs 3 less to materialize.Guo Jia LineageOn Enter: You may put three quest counters on Guo Jia. If you don't, recover 3.

effect:
**Kongming Lineage**

**On Enter:** Banish the top card of your deck. Until the beginning of your next turn, you may play it as long as your Shifting Currents face North. Repeat this process for East, South, and West.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage

On Enter: Banish the top card of your deck. Until the beginning of your next turn, you may play it as long as your Shifting Currents face North. Repeat this process for East, South, and West.
name: Kongming, Erudite Strategist
effect_html: Kongming LineageOn Enter: Banish the top card of your deck. Until the beginning of your next turn, you may play it as long as your Shifting Currents face North. Repeat this process for East, South, and West.

effect:
**Divine Relic**

Players can't declare attacks with allies that entered the field this turn.

While paying for a memory cost, you may banish CARDNAME to pay for 1 of that cost.
effect_raw:
Divine Relic

Players can't declare attacks with allies that entered the field this turn.

While paying for a memory cost, you may banish Art of War to pay for 1 of that cost.
name: Art of War
effect_html: Divine RelicPlayers can't declare attacks with allies that entered the field this turn.While paying for a memory cost, you may banish Art of War to pay for 1 of that cost.

rule.description: It retains any durability counters as it transforms. While transformed, if there are 0 durability counters on it, it will be destroyed as a state based action.

effect_html: Class Bonus Unique Warrior allies you control can attack using this weapon.Class Bonus At the beginning of your end phase, if your champion is exia element, you may pay 3. If you do, transform Huaji of Heaven's Rise.

editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 damage to each champion.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever non-combat damage is dealt to one or more units by a fire element source you control, put a **quest** counter on your champion.

[REST]: You may remove seven **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 damage to each champion.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever non-combat damage is dealt to one or more units by a fire element source you control, put a quest counter on your champion.

REST: You may remove seven quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Ruby Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] **On Banish**: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, return CARDNAME to the field transformed. *(It enters as Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix.)*
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] On Banish: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, return Suzaku to the field transformed. (It enters as Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix.)

If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Ruby Fatestone.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Immortal -> Immortality
If a transformed double-faced object would enter the graveyard from the field, it goes to the default location that the front would go. In this case, a regalia goes to its owner's banishment.

effect_html: Immortality, SpellshroudGuo Jia Bonus At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 damage to each champion.Guo Jia Bonus Whenever non-combat damage is dealt to one or more units by a fire element source you control, put a quest counter on your champion.: You may remove seven quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Ruby Fatestone.

editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**
[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, each player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your deck, put a **quest** counter on your champion.

[REST]: You may remove nine **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.

Immortality, Spellshroud

REST: You may remove nine quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Sapphire Fatestone.

**Spellshroud**, **Taunt**

[Guo Jia Bonus] (3): CARDNAME gets +**X** [LIFE] until end of turn, where **X** is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only once per turn.

Spellshroud, Taunt

[Guo Jia Bonus] (3): Genbu gets +X LIFE until end of turn, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only once per turn.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Immortal -> Immortality

The suppression ability can only be used once per object instance. If Fabled Emerald Fatestone would leave the field and return as a new instance, its controller will be able to use this ability again.
If Fabled Emerald Fatestone is suppressed, it will still trigger its ability to give your champion a quest counter.

effect_html: Immortality, SpellshroudGuo Jia Bonus 4,: As a Spell, suppress another target item, weapon, or ally. Activate this ability only once.Guo Jia Bonus Whenever you suppress an object, put a quest counter on your champion.: You may remove eight quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Emerald Fatestone.

editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a **quest** counter on your champion. 

[REST]: You may remove ten **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a quest counter on your champion. 

REST: You may remove ten quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**, **Taunt**

[Guo Jia Bonus] **On Attack:** Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • **Empower X**+2, where **X** is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud, Taunt

[Guo Jia Bonus] On Attack: Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • Empower X+2, where X is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.name: Seiryuu, Azure Dragon

rule.description: The quest counter ability only triggers if the controller is the one banishing a card from their memory. It doesn't trigger if a different player banishes a card from it. For example, the quest counter ability will not trigger from an opponent resolving a Chilling Touch against a player that controls Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

effect:
[Diao Chan Bonus] As long as you control four or more phantasias, you may activate this card from your material deck.

*(2)*, [REST]: Target phantasia you control becomes an ally in addition to its other types with base power and life equal to its reserve cost until end of turn. Put a **buff** counter on it.
effect_raw:
[Diao Chan Bonus] As long as you control four or more phantasias, you may activate this card from your material deck.

(2), REST: Target phantasia you control becomes an ally in addition to its other types with base power and life equal to its reserve cost until end of turn. Put a buff counter on it.
name: Scepter of Awakening

rule.description: If the target phantasia of Scepter of Awakening's ability does not have a reserve cost, a power and life stat is still gained, but is set to 0.

effect_html: Diao Chan Bonus As long as you control four or more phantasias, you may activate this card from your material deck.2,: Target phantasia you control becomes an ally in addition to its other types with base power and life equal to its reserve cost until end of turn. Put a buff counter on it.

effect:
**Imbue 3** *(You may reserve all cards revealed as you activate this card. If at least three of them are norm element, this card becomes **imbued**.)*

If damage would be dealt to Shangxiang from a non-norm element source while Shangxiang is **imbued**, prevent 2 of that damage.
effect_raw:
Imbue 3 (You may reserve all cards revealed as you activate this card. If at least three of them are norm element, this card becomes imbued.)

If damage would be dealt to Shangxiang from a non-norm element source while Shangxiang is imbued, prevent 2 of that damage.
name: Shangxiang, Fierce Princess
effect_html: Imbue 3 (You may reserve all cards revealed as you activate this card. If at least three of them are norm element, this card becomes imbued.)If damage would be dealt to Shangxiang from a non-norm element source while Shangxiang is imbued, prevent 2 of that damage.

editions.flavor: Even if the sun goes down, another shall always rise to greet the dawn.

effect:

[Class Bonus] Warrior weapons you control get +1 [POWER].

[Class Bonus] Warrior weapons you control get +1 POWER.
name: Sun Ce, Weaponsmaster
effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: Put a durability counter on target Warrior weapon you control. Class Bonus Warrior weapons you control get +1.

effect:
Unique allies your opponents control have **pride 2**.

[Level 2+] (3), [REST]: As a Spell, gain control of target unique ally. Activate this ability only if there are three or more unique allies on the field you don't control.

Unique allies your opponents control have pride 2.

effect:
**On Enter**: Depending on the amount of cards in your memory—
• 0— Draw two cards.
• 1 to 3— **Recover 4**.
• 4 to 6— **Glimpse 4**.
• 7 or more— Each opponent discards a card at random from their memory.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Depending on the amount of cards in your memory—
• 0— Draw two cards.
• 1 to 3— Recover 4.
• 4 to 6— Glimpse 4.
• 7 or more— Each opponent discards a card at random from their memory.
name: Zhang Jiao, Way of Peace
effect_html: On Enter: Depending on the amount of cards in your memory— • 0— Draw two cards. • 1 to 3— Recover 4. • 4 to 6— Glimpse 4. • 7 or more— Each opponent discards a card at random from their memory.

effect:
Allies with **frenzy** counters on them don't obey their controller. *(They can't attack and **intercept**, and their activated abilities can't be activated.)*

[Class Bonus] [REST]: Choose one— 
• Put a **frenzy** counter on target ally.
• **Empower X**, where **X** is the amount of allies on the field with a **frenzy** counter on them.
effect_raw:
Allies with frenzy counters on them don't obey their controller. (They can't attack and intercept, and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

[Class Bonus] REST: Choose one— 
• Put a frenzy counter on target ally.
• Empower X, where X is the amount of allies on the field with a frenzy counter on them.
name: Da Qiao, Cinderbinder

rule.description: A unit that does not obey its controller can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

effect_html: Allies with frenzy counters on them don't obey their controller. (They can't attack and intercept, and their activated abilities can't be activated.)Class Bonus : Choose one— • Put a frenzy counter on target ally. • Empower X, where X is the amount of allies on the field with a frenzy counter on them.

effect:

editions.effect:
As long as you control an arcane element Shenju ally, ignore this card's elemental requirements as you activate it. 

[Class Bonus] **On Death**: Banish CARDNAME%%,% and a card at random from your memory. When you do, as a Spell, deal **X** damage to target champion where **X** is the total reserve cost of the banished cards.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: "Banish Harbinger of Lightning" -> "Banish Harbinger of Lightning,"

The on death ability checks to banish the card that represented the object from the graveyard. If it can't be banished from the graveyard this way, the associated reflexive triggered ability won't trigger.

Only constant reserve costs can be added in order to determine the amount of damage that the on death trigger would deal. If a variable cost would be added (e.g. X as a reserve cost), it is ignored and not added at all.

effect_html: As long as you control an arcane element Shenju ally, ignore this card's elemental requirements as you activate it. Class Bonus On Death: Banish Harbinger of Lightning, and a card at random from your memory. When you do, as a Spell, deal X damage to target champion where X is the total reserve cost of the banished cards.

effect:
[Damage 35+] Fast Activation

[Class Bonus] Deal up to 7 damage to your champion. Destroy all non-champion objects with reserve cost equal to the amount of damage dealt to your champion this way.
effect_raw:
[Damage 35+] Fast Activation

[Class Bonus] Deal up to 7 damage to your champion. Destroy all non-champion objects with reserve cost equal to the amount of damage dealt to your champion this way.
name: Annihilation
effect_html: Damage 35+ Fast ActivationClass Bonus Deal up to 7 damage to your champion. Destroy all non-champion objects with reserve cost equal to the amount of damage dealt to your champion this way.

editions.flavor: While the Shenju are revered throughout Sanguo, legends tell of few encounters–none with happy ends.

effect: As long as you control a Shenju ally, advanced element cards your opponents activate cost 2 more to activate.
effect_raw: As long as you control a Shenju ally, advanced element cards your opponents activate cost 2 more to activate.
name: Glorious Presence

other_orientations.effect:
**Vigor**

Other champions get -3 level and all allies get -3 [POWER].

**On Ally Kill**: Deal **X** unpreventable damage to each other champion where **X** is the killed ally's power stat plus its life stat.

effect:
**Taunt**, **Vigor**

**On Attack**: If this is CARDNAME's first attack this turn, you may pay (2). If you do, wake up CARDNAME.
 
[Diao Chan Bonus] If your champion would die with exactly thirty-two damage counters on them, banish them, transform CARDNAME, and destroy all other objects you control instead.
effect_raw:
Taunt, Vigor

On Attack: If this is Lu Bu's first attack this turn, you may pay (2). If you do, wake up Lu Bu.
 
[Diao Chan Bonus] If your champion would die with exactly thirty-two damage counters on them, banish them, transform Lu Bu, and destroy all other objects you control instead.
name: Lu Bu, Indomitable Titan
